concept.title: Job and Salary Changes
concept.shortdesc: The Mass Updates feature enables you to change job and salary information to apply updates to multiple employee records at one time. Use this feature to apply mass job changes (for example,job changes due to restructure or growth within an organization) or mass salary changes (for example, salary adjustments for different job markets).

conbody.p: For organizations with multiple component companies, individual mass updates for job and salary information must be completed and submitted separately for each company.
The Add Mass Updates page lists all submitted updates, including details such as the type of update, status, name of individual who submitted the update, and effective date.
